com.yahoo.bullet.windowing

Class Basic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.bullet.windowing.Scheme
      • com.yahoo.bullet.windowing.Basic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closable, Monoidal
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SlidingRecord, Tumbling

    public class Basic
extends Scheme
    This is a scheme that does not do any windowing. It just proxies the Monoidal calls to the Strategy. This window is only ever closed when the underlying Strategy is also Strategy.isClosed().

      • Basic

        public Basic(Strategy aggregation,
             Window window,
             BulletConfig config)
        Creates an instance of this windowing scheme with the provided Strategy and BulletConfig.
        Parameters:
        aggregation - The non-null initialized aggregation strategy that this window will operate.
        window - The initialized, configured window to use.
        config - The validated config to use.

      • resetForPartition

        public void resetForPartition()
        Description copied from class: Scheme
        Resets the window when operating in partition mode. If this window has been consuming slices of data (partitions) instead of the full data, you should use this method to reset the window to maintain the windowing invariant.
        Specified by:
        resetForPartition in class Scheme

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()
        Description copied from interface: Closable
        Returns true if this is currently closed.
        Returns:
        A boolean denoting whether this object is current closed.

      • isClosedForPartition

        public boolean isClosedForPartition()
        Description copied from class: Scheme
        Returns true if this window is closed when operating in partition mode. If this window has been consuming slices of the data (partitions) instead of the full data, this can be used to determine whether the window could or needs to emit data to maintain the windowing invariant.
        Specified by:
        isClosedForPartition in class Scheme
        Returns:
        A boolean whether this window is considered closed if it were consuming a slice of the data.

      • start

        public void start()
        Description copied from class: Scheme
        Readies the window for querying. This is called in Querier.restart().
        Specified by:
        start in class Scheme
